// GFindNode.h
#ifndef _GFindNode_H
#define _GFindNode_H


#include <gvpath.h>



//
//      GFindNodeTraversal
//
// traverse graph to find a specific node 
class GFindNodeTraversal : public GPathTraversal 
{
public :
        RT(GFindNodeTraversal);

        GFindNodeTraversal(GNode *findMe=NULL) : nodeToFind(findMe), GPathTraversal() 
                {  
                        found = FALSE;
                        traverseAll = 1;
                    traverseTransformHierarchyOnly=1;

                }
        
        ~GFindNodeTraversal();
        
        int Do(GNode *n);
        
        void InitializeAttributes(); 

        GNode *nodeToFind;
        
        BOOL found;
        GvPath foundPath;

        int Found(GNode *node);

};



#endif
Generated at Thu Jan 27 18:45:11 2000 for blaxxunContact3D by 1.0.0 written by Dimitri van Heesch, © 1997-1999
